resources.string: Hello, welcome to the Three Points game! In this game your job is to connect two shores using mathematical functions.
1. To add a function, tap the plus button located at the bottom of your screen. This will bring up Math Operation buttons and the current function value.
2. Then, select an operation you want to perform on the current function and it will immediately display a shrunken version of the functions graph.
3. Experiment! Try out different mathematical operations to get interesting solutions.
4. When youre satisfied with your function, you can tap the "Done" button and your new function will display on the main graph.
5. When youre finished with your task, tap the triangle button located at the top of your screen to check your solution. It will launch a train running through your function.
6. At higher levels of the game, you may encounter empty figures, which are contour objects for which the function must pass.

7. At the same time along the path to building of the function which may encounter obstacles - filled figures, which the function should not cross. Pay attention and take these objects into account in order to properly build a function and connect the two riverbanks.
We hope these tips will help you in passing the game. Study functions, experiment and build a bridge across the shores! Good luck!
